title: chat is not working
body:
chat is saying its unable to connect and i cant call roles or anything when i jump in a game of normals, cant even see anyone elses like what they called
as far as i know i havent been chat banned unless yous have done it without notifying me 
i just really would like this fixed cause its hard to know what me and my team are doing if theres no communication

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you using a wireless connection? Please switch to a wired connection and see if this issue persists.
